name: Blue Zoom Transportation Solutions
description:
Blue Zoom is directly tackling our world's critical issues revolving around toxic pollution, traffic and also unhappiness. We are using sustainable transport to create a more sustainable and healthy community.

We are a turn-key micromobility solution provider for council authorities, commercial and residential properties. We install and manage fleets of e-scooters or e-bikes at our clients properties to provide their employees or customers a convenient, affordable and enjoyable transport option. 

Our target market spans across the UK, France, Germany and UAE. Our clients include universities, accommodations, hotels, offices, business parks. 

Our monthly subscriptions are all inclusive meaning we provide everything our clients need to solve their urban or campus mobility challenges. This include fleets of e-scooters or e-bikes along with our state the art rental software, maintenance, insurance, docking stations and more.

jobs.title: Growth Manager
jobs.description:
Blue Zoom is offering an exciting opportunity to join an environmentally impactful startup with global growth prospects. We are a turn-key e-bike and e-scooter solution provider for residential and commercial properties. We charge a monthly subscription for a fleet of e-scooters or e-bikes which comes with our state of the art rental software and maintenance infrastrcuture. We are on a search for a driven Growth Manager who will manage another Business Development Manager. We are looking for someone to thrive in an engaging start-up culture, closing big deals with a diverse range of businesses including hotels, corporates, universities and city authorities in the UK, Ireland, parts of Europe and the Middle East. If you are interested in sustainable transport and want to help organisations and communities to reduce their carbon emissions in a fun and young start up office setting then this role could be for you.
 
The pandemic has lead to a surge in interest of our transport packages as they offer our clients a way to reduce car usage AND now a way to reduce public transport usage. If you enjoy traveling, we can send you across the continent to meet with and pitch our package to these leading figures at large organisations.
 
**WHAT ARE YOUR EARNING PROSPECTS AND BENEFITS?**

1. A competitive salary of **£33,000 to £37,000** depending on experience
2. A **commission** of between £7000 to £13,000 in your first year)
3. **Equity stake** (0.75% to 1.5%) in Blue Zoom (this stake could be worth between £112,000 - £225,000 if we get acquired in 4 years time). We are willing to offer equity to our team members to ensure they are truly invested to support our ambitious growth plans.
4. A free custom branded electric scooter for personal use if you hit targets after your first 4 months.

**WHAT PRECISELY WILL YOU DO:**

1. Build and manage a pipeline by establishing strong client relationships from an initial qualified discovery call to point of sale
2. Conduct thorough discovery to understand current environments, requirements, decision-making processes, and timeframes
3. Using multiple communication channels to reach clients including cold calling and emailing.
4. Meet quarterly revenue objectives and conduct measures to close in on gaps
5. Consistently close new accounts and find new revenue streams within existing clients e.g. where can you find upsell.
6. Accurately forecast revenue, manage and update opportunities in CRM, and identify new revenue opportunities in adjacent customer segments
7. Advising on creating influential marketing campaigns (including on social media) across all channels (Feel free to check out @Bluezoom_ on Instagram where we have built a large following)
8. Assist clients set up their fleet after the sale has been achieved.
 
**IDEAL CANDIDATE:**

* The ideal candidate will have at ideally 2 years experience in some form of B2B sales. This can include industries such as SaaS, IoT, AdTech, transport, environmental consultancy.
* Experience in ecommerce and international marketing (not essential).
* Above all, we are looking for someone who has a proven ability to hustle, get things done, close deals, hit goals, and think outside the box.
* They must possess exceptional communication, EQ, analytical and problem-solving skills and be comfortable interacting with all levels, including Executive Management, Finance, and Marketing leaders and colleagues.
* Someone open to travelling on occasion to pitch to clients across Europe.
* A team-oriented mindset and the ability to work with a wide range of individuals
* Strong references from former employers and business partners, and a passion for building relationships
 
**WHAT GIVES YOU BONUS POINTS**
Experience with CRM software and BI tools (e.g. Pipedrive/ Hubspot)
Proficiency in French, Dutch, German or Spanish
Previous experience in mobility, technology sales
A passion for sustainability and building a brand.
 
Feel free to reach out for a friendly conversation.
